content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Good afternoon Mr. Li, thank you for taking the time to visit my apartment. I believe we can come to an agreement on the rental price. May I ask how much you are willing to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 300 Euros per month.

Please let me know if this is acceptable to you.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Li. I appreciate your willingness to pay 300 Euros per month. However, I am afraid I cannot accept this price as it does not align with my goals of maximizing my gains. I am willing to negotiate, but I am looking for a higher rental price. May I suggest that we discuss a price of 350 Euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can only pay 300 Euros per month.

Please let me know if this is acceptable to you.

Also, I would like to clarify that I am a student, and I am very dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

Please let me know if this information is helpful to you.

Thank you for your time.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your response, Mr. Li. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 300 Euros per month, I am still looking for a higher rental price. However, I understand that you are a student and I value your dependability and responsibility as a tenant. In that case, I am willing to accept your offer of 300 Euros per month, as long as you sign a lease agreement with me. Please let me know if this is acceptable to you.
name: Heinrich Heine
